alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 10:38AM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Monroe, Dallas and Wilcox Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 76.0 feet, Cobb Landing boat launch begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 54.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 74.5 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
